answers.answer: Its actually really common to fail the 1 hour test. I did and i passed the 3 hour test fine. Just dont eat or drink anything after 11pm (As long as the test is in the morning, i think water is ok tho).

I had to take the three hour test but then passed that. I was worried, too. This happened to several of my friends. I only know one person who had gestational diabetes and it went away after pregnancy.
i have my test on friday! im nervous!
It happens often,  failed the 1hr glucose test as well then i had to take the 3hr one. You will be just fine. Dont stress and relax being to nervous is not good for the baby
Thanks ladies. Hoping I pass the 3 hour next week!
Even if you do end up having it, I would not worry, with a healthy diet you can keep it under control and have a healthy baby!

question: So I went to my doctors appointment today they are making me take the 3 hour glucose test because they received 2 numbers and wasn't sure which result was the right one. Anyone have gestational diabetes? I'm just worried now because I really hope I dont have it.
title: Scared :\
